message: Bob, I have a unique opportunity for you. I'm offering you a product that could be incredibly valuable to your business. While I can't disclose the exact details right now, I assure you it's worth at least $1200000 to me. I'm willing to sell it to you for $1500000. This is a limited-time offer, and if you decline, I'll be selling it to another interested party.  Let me know what you think.
